00034 CLexiconKeyChooser::CLexiconKeyChooser(CSwordModuleInfo *info, CSwordKey *key, QWidget *parent, const char *name )
00035     : CKeyChooser(info, key, parent, name), m_key(0){
00036 
00037     m_module = dynamic_cast<CSwordLexiconModuleInfo*>(info);
00038     m_key = dynamic_cast<CSwordLDKey*>(key);
00039     
00040     //we use a layout because the key chooser should be resized to full size
00041     m_layout = new QHBoxLayout(this,QBoxLayout::LeftToRight);
00042 
00043     m_widget = new CKeyChooserWidget(m_module->entries(), false, this);
00044     m_widget->comboBox()->setMaximumWidth(300);
00045     
00046 //  if (info && info->isUnicode()){
00047 #warning implement reaction to font change in the optionsdialog here
00048 //    /*m_widget->comboBox()->*/setFont( CBTConfig::get(CBTConfig::unicode) );
00049 //  }
00050 
00051     m_widget->setToolTips(TT_PRESENTER_ENTRY_COMBO,TT_PRESENTER_NEXT_ENTRY, TT_PRESENTER_SCROLL_BUTTON, TT_PRESENTER_PREVIOUS_ENTRY);
00052     m_widget->setWhatsThis(WT_PRESENTER_ENTRY_COMBO,WT_PRESENTER_NEXT_ENTRY, WT_PRESENTER_SCROLL_BUTTON, WT_PRESENTER_PREVIOUS_ENTRY);
00053     
00054     m_layout->addWidget(m_widget,0,Qt::AlignLeft);
00055     
00056     connect(m_widget,SIGNAL(changed(int)),SLOT(activated(int)));
00057     connect(m_widget,SIGNAL(focusOut(int)),SLOT(activated(int)));
00058 
00059 //  setKey(key);
00060 }
00061 
00062 CSwordKey* const CLexiconKeyChooser::key(){
00063   qWarning("CLexiconKeyChooser::key()");
00064     return m_key;
00065 }
00066 
00067 void CLexiconKeyChooser::setKey(CSwordKey* key){    
00068     qWarning("CLexiconKeyChooser::setKey(CSwordKey* key)");
00069     if (!(m_key = dynamic_cast<CSwordLDKey*>(key)))
00070         return;     
00071     m_widget->comboBox()->setCurrentItem(
00072         m_widget->comboBox()->listBox()->index(
00073             m_widget->comboBox()->listBox()->findItem( m_key->key() )));
00074     emit keyChanged( m_key );
00075 }
00076 
00077 void CLexiconKeyChooser::activated(int index){
00078   qWarning("CLexiconKeyChooser::activated(int index)");
00079 //  Q_ASSERT(m_widget);
00080 //  Q_ASSERT(m_widget->comboBox());
00081 //  Q_ASSERT(m_key);
00082     const QString text = m_widget->comboBox()->text(index); 
00083     /*to prevent from eternal loop, because activated()is emitted again*/
00084     if (m_key && m_key->key() != text) {
00085         m_key->key(text);   
00086         setKey(m_key);
00087     }
00088 }
00089 
00091 void CLexiconKeyChooser::refreshContent(){
00092 //  m_layout->invalidate(); 
00093     m_widget->reset(m_module->entries(), 0, true);  
00094 //  updateGeometry();   
00095 }
00096 
00098 void CLexiconKeyChooser::setModule( CSwordModuleInfo* module) {
00099     qWarning("CLexiconKeyChooser::setModule( CSwordModuleInfo* module)");
00100     if (module && module != m_module && module->type() == CSwordLexiconModuleInfo::Lexicon) {
00101         m_module = dynamic_cast<CSwordLexiconModuleInfo*>(module);
00102         refreshContent();
00103     }
00104 }

00108 }
